MS MCQs

    Understand Microsoft 365 governance - Summary and knowledge check

    »

    1. Which Microsoft 365 team supports security and compliance efforts as part of maintaining compliance certifications?

      Microsoft 365 Security

      Microsoft 365 Identity

      Microsoft 365 Business Continuity

      Microsoft 365 Trust


    2. Which of the following policies provides comprehensive security governance for all Microsoft engineering groups?

      Microsoft Policy Framework

      Microsoft Security Policy

      Microsoft 365 Information Security Policy


    3. Which of the following statements is accurate?

      The Microsoft 365 Control Framework provides detailed security requirements for all of Microsoft.

      The Microsoft 365 Information Security Policy governs all components of the Microsoft 365 information system.

      Exceptions to the Microsoft 365 Information Security policy do not require review.


    4. Which of the following personnel requirements protects Microsoft information systems when an employee is terminated?

      Personnel screening

      Standards of Business Conduct

      Access revocation
